sources.title: On with the New (1938)
sources.description: Frustrated at her job as a a short order cook and dishwasher at a local diner, Betty Boop decides to call it quits and tries her luck at a new automated day care center. But, oh my, compared this, her kitchen job and crummy former boss felt like heaven. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/on-with-the-new-1938/

metadata.Plot: Frustrated at her job as a a short order cook and dishwasher at a local diner, Betty Boop decides to call it quits and tries her luck at a new automated day care center. But, oh my, compared this, her kitchen job and crummy former boss felt like heaven.
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Margie Hines
